title: Drawing, "Cabinet", ca. 1929–30
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower left: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower right: SCALE 1"-1'0", 7685 [circled]; dimensions and materials in graphite
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing for large display cabinet. Rectangular upper portion of cabinet with burled (?) wood on outside, two interior glass shelves, and sliding  glass doors. Lower portion of cabinet with burled (?) wood in center section and base, lighter wood on outer portion. Three drawers at center with long horizontal pulls.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Cabinet", ca. 1929–30.
ca. 1929–30. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-874.
